reviews.review: Depuis la premiere fois que jy ai jouer portal restera toujour dans mes meilleurs jeux jouer.

Portal 2 is a classic. Everything about this game is fantastic, with the edition of workshop and the co-op mode, this game has much more replay value than the previous entry. The story and gameplay are golden age valve, so I really dont need to say anything else. This game really is one of those must plays, no matter what kind of person you are, if you enjoy video games, you will love Portal 2.
Still holds up as one of the greatest games visually and mechanically 9 years later :)
Лучшая игра в мире Спидранить одно удовлоьсвтие
This and its predecessor are quintessential games for anybody who loves puzzles and/or FPS games but doesn't want a carbon-copy FPS. It's brilliant.

I try to replay this game annually, which is just enough time for me to forget a lot of the puzzles. The humor is as amazing as the gameplay. I think this game will become a timeless classic, if it isn't already.

*VAGUE PORTAL 1 AND PORTAL 2 SPOILERS (just some details about some sections but not really any plot spoiler)*

this is the first game i played that really got me into it's universe (btw i played this around 2015 or 16 as a kid during the time valve games where already overshadowed by cod and those other fps so i really had no reason to know what they were but i did), i mean portal 1 has also an interesting history and all but this one expanded it into not just being some random lab that is really white at its tests, really brown in its more industrial parts and fells big but not gigantic to be techy white tests with a bit more color so its not just white and black, futuristic industrial areas plus the addition of that 
cool bottom part of the facility that is full of garbage and old retro test chambers and those overgrowth sections that really looked pretty, and the facility being absolutely gigantic with tubes and kinda floating test chambers that give more life to it. Really a masterpiece compared to the original, along with half life 2 i think this is one of the best sequels to games in general.

This game is excellent! The best part is that it scales beautifully to 4k@60hz with max settings on a RX 570! The resolution scaling adds a lot to this game.
No violence, cool and fun. 12 out of 10!!

I did not think it would be possible, but this game is actually better than the first Portal game. Incredible. If you love puzzles with creative mechanics, this game is for you. If you enjoyed the first Portal game, you will love this one.

I got the platinum trophy with two different console accounts.. I love this game. It's great for all ages, and really tests your brain power. I would recommend purchasing the bundle and playing Portal first as it is a bit of a tutorial and the story continues in this sequel. The casting was great in this also and the comedy had me laughing out loud almost every level. Love it, highly recommend.
I love this game! I could not resist wanting not stop playing it! So much fun. Its easy to get stuck but it makes it fun :D
Great game. Only played the single player, but it was really fun. All the puzzles were achievable and gradually got quite challenging. Very fun and cheap nowadays, no excuse to not play!
le jeu mérite son statu de pilier du jeu PC
I got steam just for this game about 3 years ago. Worth it.
The Atmosphere is incredible and the gameplay is incredibly smooth

Pamiętaj – kiedy życie daje ci cytryny, nie rób lemoniady! No chyba, że chcesz skończyć z Ziemniaczanym Podręcznym Urządzeniem Portalowym Aperture Science, biegając po jakiś ruinach, starej, zapomnianej firmy, która konkurowała z Black Mesą. Albo na księżycu. Ale nie zamartwiaj się. Przynajmniej zawsze przy twoim boku będzie różowiutka Kostka Towarzysząca. Albo Wheatley. A nawet jak żadne z nich nie będzie ci odpowiadać, to wciąż pozostają słodziutkie, zabójcze turrety. 10/10

Not much to say other than this is one of my favorite games ever!

What can I say about Portal 2 that hasn't been said hundreds of times, it is one of the best games of all time. The perfect sequel to the first, this game expands so much off of the original Portal. This game introduces far more mechanics, Funnels, Gels, Bridges etc. The story is unique and amazing, the story-telling this game does by just environments alone is incredible. But then of course you have the extremely well written dialogue. The characters are funny and whilst the overall script and tone of the game may not be as dark as the original, it still has it's fair share of dark comedy and creepy moments. The game play is outstanding and the pacing of each puzzle is perfect for helping you learn how to use these new mechanics. Having to occasionally derail from the test track as the story progresses really keeps you hooked. This game has plenty of replay value, single player is the perfect length and when you're finished with it, there's still a lot more fun to be had. The co-op mode is perfect with a friend who is also new to co-op, working out how to solve puzzles with your friend is very satisfying, and something that can make the both of you feel smart. This game also has an easy to use editor to make your own puzzles to share with the rest of the world, you can also play the thousands of other puzzles that people have made and that people are still making to this day. The soundtrack is also something to be mentioned as it is one of the best soundtrack's in any game. Like the first game, every piece fits the game perfectly, the music is more upbeat and frantic than the original's eerie soundtrack.

So, If you have played the original Portal, then what are you waiting for buy Portal 2. And if you haven't played the original, I recommend you play that first and then immediately play this.
One of the best games I've played.
